A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Truly wretched. Script was abysmal and plot logic and character motivations were at the kindergarten level. Poor Laura Dern\, poor everyone. Several painfully cheap effects on top of it all. No humor\, no suspense. Contrast the The scenes of the Empire tracking them across light speed with the similar scenes in the Battlestar Galactica reboot to get a sense of how bad it was. Made me pine for Jar Jar Binks. What was JJ Abrams thinking?
